lesson.title: Read the sentence
lesson.content: J'aime vraiment voyager avec mes amis

music.cardContent: Discover the rich vocabulary of musical genres, instruments, and the joy of expressing yourself

travelling.cardContent: Confidently navigate your travels, exploring new cultures and exciting destinations without any language obstacles.

food.cardContent: Learn how to confidently choose your favorite dishes at cafe and communicate your preferences with ease.

shopping.cardContent: Effortlessly shop and communicate your needs without any language barriers hindering your experience.
